employees.name: David Flanagan
employees.title: President and Principal
employees.bio: A company founder, Mr. Flanagan oversees region-wide development opportunities for the entire company.

employees.name: Jeff Rice
employees.title: Chief Financial Officer
employees.bio: A Certified Public Accountant, Jeff obtains the financing that supports Elm Street’s acquisition, development and construction programs.

employees.name: John Clarke
employees.title: Regional Partner
employees.bio: Oversees the land acquisition and development activities in DC Suburban Maryland and Frederick region. Responsible for all Elm Street efforts in Montgomery, Frederick, Prince George’s and Washington Counties, MD.

employees.name: Russ Dickens
employees.title: Regional Partner
employees.bio: Oversees the land acquisition and development activities of the Ellicott City based team. Responsible for all Elm Street efforts in Baltimore, Carroll, Cecil, Harford and Howard Counties, Maryland.

employees.name: Karen McJunkin
employees.title: Regional Partner
employees.bio: Directs the land acquisition and development activities of the Annapolis based team. Responsible for all Elm Street efforts in Washington D.C and Anne Arundel County, Charles County and the Eastern Shore of Maryland.

employees.name: Jim Perry
employees.title: Regional Partner
employees.bio: Directs the Virginia development team. Responsible for all of Elm Street’s Virginia acquisition and development activities.

employees.name: Kristen G. Hartman
employees.title: Treasurer
employees.bio: A Certified Public Accountant, Kris leads the team responsible for project accounting, tax planning, tax returns and financial statements for all companies under the Elm Street umbrella.

employees.name: Lauren Bauer
employees.title: Vice President
employees.bio: Responsible for managing all facets of Elm Street’s commercial and multi-family assets.

employees.name: Jude Burke
employees.title: Vice President
employees.bio: Responsible for all acquisition and development efforts in Prince George’s County, Maryland.

employees.name: Mike Burlbaugh

employees.bio: Responsible for all acquisition and development efforts in the Annapolis area as well as Queen Anne’s and Talbot Counties, Maryland.

employees.name: Michael Charlton
employees.title: Vice President
employees.bio: Responsible for land acquisition and development activities in Harford and Cecil Counties, Maryland and Southern Pennsylvania.

employees.name: Doug Flanagan

employees.name: Steve Horne
employees.title: Vice President
employees.bio: Responsible for land acquisition and development opportunities in Washington D.C. and Anne Arundel County, Maryland.

employees.name: Joe Jacobs

employees.bio: Leads all acquisition and development efforts in Prince William, Stafford and Culpeper Counties, Virginia.

employees.name: Jim Krapf

employees.name: Kate Kubit

employees.name: Doug Meeker

employees.name: Jim Mobley

employees.name: Dave Murphy

employees.name: Jack Perkins

employees.name: Stefanie Smith

employees.bio: Leads acquisition and residential development efforts in Arlington and Loudoun Counties as well as portions of Fairfax County.

employees.name: Jason Van Kirk

employees.name: Jason Wiley
